50cbe0c5-f29a-4733-be22-1cd6982df26b.description: To ensure your Café Appliances buying experience is exceptional, we provide the Café Certified Sales Professional program to our resellers. To become certified, members must complete the program. Find nearby Café Certified resellers on https://www.cafeappliances.com/find-a-store/ using our find a store function. You’ll know you can trust them to answer your questions about Café Appliances and offer insight into appliance styles, colors, features, and more.
50cbe0c5-f29a-4733-be22-1cd6982df26b.name: Café Certified Sales Professional

issuer.summary: issued by GE Appliances, A Haier Company

badge_template_activities.title: To become certified, we train sales associates on:
What makes the Café Appliances brand a personal choice with our style-conscious customers.
Product lines including our distinctly designed major appliances.

To remain certified, sales associates must stay current on new designs and features. Recertification is an annual process so you can rest assured associates are knowledgeable about all the latest Café Appliances products.

288bbc35-ee96-4273-b737-3a2a48c8c908.description: The Monogram Sales Certification is designed to educate, evaluate, and elevate the effectiveness of appliance sales professionals when selling Monogram appliances. The intent of the program is to prepare sales associates with a deeper knowledge of the Monogram brand, products, and resources so they can better serve clients during the purchasing process. For more information on Monogram Appliances, please visit www.monogram.com.
288bbc35-ee96-4273-b737-3a2a48c8c908.name: Monogram Certified Sales Professional

issuer.summary: issued by GE Appliances, A Haier Company

badge_template_activities.title: Appliance sales professionals are required to complete an online Monogram Certification program. The on-demand format allows participants to complete the certification at their own pace. The Monogram Certification program informs sales associates about the Monogram brand, luxury customer, product line-up and key features along with showroom demonstration tips.
Participants complete a series of assessments that reinforce and test retention of key content.
Participants must keep their certification current through an annual re-certification process.

5b04f2df-8a94-4130-91e0-a1d1fb18e53b.description: To ensure your Café Appliances buying experience is exceptional, we provide the Café Certified Sales Professional program to our resellers. To become certified, members must complete the program. Find nearby Café Certified resellers on https://www.cafeappliances.com/find-a-store/ using our find a store function. You’ll know you can trust them to answer your questions about Café Appliances and offer insight into appliance styles, colors, features, and more.
5b04f2df-8a94-4130-91e0-a1d1fb18e53b.name: Café Certified Sales Professionals (Reseller)

issuer.summary: issued by GE Appliances, A Haier Company

badge_template_activities.title: To become certified, we train and test sales associates on:
What makes the Café Appliances brand a personal choice with our style-conscious customers.
Product lines including our distinctly designed major appliances and display-worthy countertop appliances.
Key features of our appliances and how they make life easier for you.
When a retailer has 80%+ of their sales professionals successfully complete the Cafe certification, the store itself is also is given the distinction of being a Cafe Certified.

7eddf948-423e-45c6-8d1c-a882ae3c03ef.description: The Monogram Sales Certification is designed to educate, evaluate, and elevate the effectiveness of appliance sales professionals when selling Monogram appliances. The intent of the program is to prepare sales associates with a deeper knowledge of the Monogram brand, products, and resources so they can better serve clients during the purchasing process. For more information on Monogram Appliances, please visit www.monogram.com.
7eddf948-423e-45c6-8d1c-a882ae3c03ef.name: Monogram Certified Sales Professionals - Organization

issuer.summary: issued by GE Appliances, A Haier Company

badge_template_activities.title: Appliance sales professionals are required to complete an online Monogram Certification program. The on-demand format allows participants to complete the certification at their own pace. The Monogram Certification program informs sales associates about the Monogram brand, luxury customer, product line-up and key features along with showroom demonstration tips.
Participants complete a series of assessments that reinforce and test retention of key content.
Participants must keep their certification current through an annual re-certification process.
When 85% of the sales professionals at a reseller successfully complete Monogram certification, they will then be considered Monogram-certified as an organization.
